channel.title: Calculate on CyberMiles News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Calculate on CyberMiles News and Articles

item.title: Ask CyberMiles Question 3: Is it easy to build DApps on Cybermiles blockchain and what background knowledge do I need?
item.description: Q: Is it easy to build DApps on Cybermiles blockchain and what background knowledge do I need? A: It is easy. For the traditional software developers, there are two things to learn. The first is a programming language called Lity, based on Solidity from Ethereum, with the same grammar but with slightly different keywords. [Lity] develops smart contracts, and then you use a Javascript library called web3 to interact with the smart contracts.

item.title: Ask CyberMiles Question 2: Is there any chance for staking community to get a simple calculator for staked CMTs?
item.description: Q: Is there any chance for staking community to get a simple calculator for staked CMTs? A: Yes. We have simplified computation. ROI depends on 2 factors: the amount of CMTs put on stake; the ratio of CMTs between cube and Wallet. There will be a simple calculator on CMT explorer to show real time ROI. Caculator comes with the new version of CMT Wallet. Learn more at cybermiles.io.
